Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = true
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local damage = 20
local gunSound local vCharacter local vPlayer local myTorso local myHumanoid
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function onEquipped() print("On Equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") == nil and torso ~= nil then
shield = Instance.new("Part") shield.FormFactor = 3 shield.Name = "Shield" shield.Size = Vector3.new(2, 0.2, 4) shield.Shape = "Block" shield.Parent = vCharacter shield.CanCollide = false
shieldMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") shieldMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=69486628" shieldMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.1, 1.1, 1.1) shieldMesh.Name = "Mesh" shieldMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=69486552" shieldMesh.Parent = shield
shieldWeld = Instance.new("Weld") shieldWeld.Part0 = torso shieldWeld.Part1 = shield shieldWeld.Name = "ShieldHolder" --shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -0.8)) shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, math.pi) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -0.8)) shieldWeld.Parent = torso end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso then shield = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") shieldWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") end end if shield then shield:Remove() end if shieldWeld then shieldWeld:Remove() end
end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Gun = Tool.Handle
Tool.Enabled = true
local vCharacter local shieldWeld
local shieldWalkAnim local slashAnim local bashAnim local lungeAnim local time
local shieldActive local lastAttack = 0
local bashDamage = 13 local damage = 20 local connection
local dashTime = 0 local lastKeyDown = 0
local torsoCFrames = {}
local minRange = 2 local maxRange = 500
local ray = Instance.new("Part") ray.FormFactor = 3 ray.Shape = "Ball" ray.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) ray.CanCollide = false ray.Transparency = 0.0
local bullet = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") bullet.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65020210" bullet.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65020347" bullet.Parent = ray bullet.Scale = Vector3.new(0.02, 0.02, 0.02)
local runService = game:service("RunService")
function slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) shieldBash = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool["ShieldBash"]) if shieldBash == nil then Tool.Enabled = true return end shieldBash:Play() local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - myTorso.Position) * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) newBV = nil if direction.magnitude > .01 then direction = direction.unit newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 100000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, 0, newBV.P) newBV.velocity = direction * 50 newBV.Parent = myTorso myTorso.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.Position, target * Vector3.new(1, 0, 1) + Vector3.new(0, myTorso.Position.Y, 0)) end wait(.5) if newBV ~= nil then newBV:remove() end wait(.5) end
function onKeyDown(key) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end if key:lower() == "q" then if vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") then print("Found Shield")
local shield = vCharacter.Shield connection = shield.Touched:connect(bash)
torso = vCharacter.Torso shieldWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if shieldWeld then shieldWeld.Parent = leftArm shieldWeld.Part0 = leftArm
shieldWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ShieldWalk) shieldWalkAnim:Play()
shieldWeld.C1 = (shieldWeld.C1 + Vector3.new(-0.3, -0.1, 0)) * CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/5, math.pi, math.pi/5) if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 1 end ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth print(ratio) myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 130 wait(0.2) myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 130 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0
else shieldWeld = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") if shieldWeld then shieldWeld.Parent = torso shieldWeld.Part0 = torso --shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, math.pi, 0) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -1.1)) shieldWeld.C1 = CFrame.Angles(-math.pi/2, 0, math.pi) * CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0, 0.2, -0.8)) end if shieldWalkAnim then shieldWalkAnim:Stop() end if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 0 end if myHumanoid.MaxHealth > 100 then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end end end shieldActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShieldActive") if key == "e" and shieldActive then if Tool.Enabled and shieldActive.Value == 1 then Tool.Enabled = false shieldBash = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ShieldBash) if shieldBash then shieldBash:Play() end wait(1.0) Tool.Enabled = true end end
if key == "w" then t = runService.Stepped:wait() if (t - lastKeyDown < 0.2) then dashTime = t end lastKeyDown = t end end
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function bash(hit) print("Bashing") if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local opponent = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) print(1) if humanoid ~=nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= humanoid then print(2) leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then shieldGrip = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") if shieldGrip then print(3) tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(bashDamage) end end end end end
function shoot(pos, target) print("Shoot") vCharacter = Tool.Parent vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if vPlayer == nil or myTorso == nil then return end
spawnPos = myTorso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0
local rayC = ray:Clone() rayC.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) rayC.Parent = game.Workspace
bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0.0, rayC:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) bodyForce.Parent = rayC
rayC.Velocity = pos.unit * 450.0
local hit, destination = game.Workspace:FindPartOnRay(Ray.new(Gun.Position + pos*minRange, pos*maxRange), vCharacter)
if hit then print(hit) if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 35 else damage = 20 end if hit.Parent.className == "Hat" then damage = 30 humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") else humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end if humanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then local character = humanoid.Parent wait(0.1) tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) end end debris:AddItem(rayC, 2) end
function onActivatedLocal() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if not myTorso then return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not myHumanoid then return end
t = runService.Stepped:wait()
shieldActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("ShieldActive") if t - dashTime < 0.2 and shieldActive and shieldActive.Value == 1 then slashIt(myHumanoid, myTorso) wait(0.5) amAnimating = false else local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Gun.Position).unit
gunSound = Gun:FindFirstChild("GunSound") if gunSound then gunSound:Play() end
shoot(direction, target) end wait(0.8) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if shieldWalkAnim then shieldWalkAnim:Stop() end if slashAnim then slashAnim:Stop() end if bashAnim then bashAnim:Stop() end if spinAnim then spinAnim:Stop() end
if Tool.ShieldActive then Tool.ShieldActive.Value = 0 end
if vCharacter then leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if leftArm then shield = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Shield") shieldWeld = leftArm:FindFirstChild("ShieldHolder") end myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end end if connection then connection:disconnect() end if shield then shield:Remove() end if shieldWeld then shieldWeld:Remove() end if shieldBash then shieldBash:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal) Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal)
